item.title: AWS Postgres RDS IAM Authentication
item.description: Securely Accessing AWS PostgreSQL RDS Instances With IAM Relational database services have long been a cornerstone for storing and retrieving application data, dating back to the 1970s. However, managing credentials for applications, users, and administrators has always been a challenge due to the static nature of traditional credentials. With AWS RDS, we can address this issue by offering built-in IAM authentication for RDS PostgreSQL, enabling secure, short-lived access scoped to specific users or groups.
